name: Moon Keeper Coin Purse
description:
Original Design by Abril Andrade Griffith
Bag Features   Painting on both sides

Approx. dimensions: 4.5" x 2.75" (W x H)

This bags are not mass produced. They are Limited Editions of my work. You can't find them anywhere else but here.

    Double sided printing
    Designed to fit loose change, bills and credit cards

name: Jarumy Blue Butterflies Girl Cushion Cover
description:
Use this cushion case to bring Abril's Paintings  into your living area or bedroom. 
It measures about 17" x 17", can easily insert standard size cushions.

This Cover has a  velcro clousure is designed for quick laundering. The case is made of 100% polyester, and has a silky feel! 

Abril's Painting Design is on both sides of the Cover.

Bright Beautiful Colors!

This bags are not mass produced. They are Limited Editions of my work. You can't find them anywhere else but here.

Perfect for Make up , Toiletries, Art Supplies, Pencil Holder and more..
This bag is more Beautiful in person ! The colors Live up to the Original Painting.


    Made from durable 600d polyester fabric
    Zippered closure for easy access
    Zippered hidden interior compartment
    Double sided printing
    

Original Art by Abril Andrade Griffith
